actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for the repayment of the Federal excise tax on gasoline which is used for personal purposes by certain disabled veterans who are entitled to grants for automobiles with special equipment.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide either a refund or an income tax credit for Federal gasoline excise taxes paid by disabled veterans for fueling specially equipped motor vehicles for their personal use.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for the repayment of the Federal excise tax on gasoline which is used for personal purposes by certain disabled veterans who are entitled to grants for automobiles with special equipment.
